item.title: Interplays of Mathematics and Classism
item.description: MATH 10 Capstone Working Title: Interplays of Mathematics and Classism Midyear 2021 ‚≠êÔ∏è Hello! I’m Chloe. Welcome to my working file of Interplays of Mathematics and Classism . This file contains my thought processes involved in writing my capstone divided into three phases‚Äìpre-writing, rough writing, and actual writing (okay, I honestly don’t know if there are more technicalities on this). üí≠ I’m an intuitive thinker, so you can find that most of the notes here are scattered and out of place, but in a sense… organized.

item.title: Quartz Documentation
item.description: Setup Welcome to Quartz! Whether you’re setting up a website and project for the first time or a seasoned digital gardener, I hope that you’ll find something useful about this project. item.title: Showcase
item.description: Want to see what Quartz can do? Here are some cool community gardens :) Quartz Documentation (this site!) Jacky Zhao Anson Yu If you want to see your own on here, submit a Pull Request adding yourself to this file !
